summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5903 for the improvement of The Alley between Blocks 29 and 30, Carleton Park Addition, and in Block 5, Briarcliff Addition No. 2, being the alley in the block bounded by 42nd Avenue West, West Viewmont Way, and West Armour Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77916 as amended by Ordinance No. 78038, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
